attributes.action: ensure that any new Everton F.C. stadium will be built within the Liverpool City Boundary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bill Kenwright and Tesco CEO Terry Leahy are planning to move one of world proudest and most traditional sporting institutions Everton Football Club to Kirkby, Knowsley - outside of the Liverpool City Boundary.

Everton need to stay where they belong, Liverpool.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
